title: Client crashes... Still not fixed

embed.description: Dear Riot, in the past 3 days, it has happened multiple time that my client crashed right when i click accept." well just restart it ... ?", someone would say. The thing is that each time this happens i get a timer and a "bad guy reputation" in they eyes of riot.

body:
Ok.... 

So I have made a post about 20 days ago about my client crashing during AFK check or right when we get into the lobby. It happens OFTEN, to me at least. I do believe that the issue is not coming from me and on the first post a rioter asked me to explain the problem more in depth .... even tho its kinda simple. I am losing my time and my LP, hard earned LB btw (hard to carry through silver) for absolutely nothing. At the time im making this post, i am currently in a 30 min wait timer because of this issue and it drives me crazy. I don't know what's causing it, but i'm getting really tired of it. Simply put, what happens is that i click accept on the AFK check (has to be just after -.-) and then a box pops up saying that lol client isnt responding. Tell me if i have to change something on my side but give me an explanation as to why its happening so i can perhaps fix it. Otherwise... plz adress this issue.

TY very much

replies.body:
Crashes during champion select or when interacting with the PvP.net system (accepting queue) are generally caused by an unstable connection to the servers. I strongly advise checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which lists common solutions for these types of issues.

Let me know if those steps helped resolve this.
